entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is angry and wants to jinx Dudley.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Harry's cousin, who is being threatened by Harry with a wand.

relationships.description: Harry has fourteen years of hatred towards Dudley, which he expresses through his actions and words.
Harry threatens to jinx Dudley with his wand, causing Dudley to become frightened and defensive.
